PageTitle: Online office suite for Alfresco Share
PageDescription: Edit and co-edit documents within Alfresco Share
EnableCollaborativeDocumentEditing: Enable collaborative document editing in Alfresco Share using ONLYOFFICE Docs
WorkWithOfficeDocuments: Work with Office documents within ONLYOFFICE from Alfresco Share
DocumentsTab1Label: View, create and edit text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and fillable forms.
DocumentsTab2Label: Build custom templates and create documents from them.
DocumentsTab3Label: Convert a non-XML document into XML format (DOCX, XLSX or PPTX). Export/import to/from PDF.
DocumentsTab4Label: Co-author documents with multiple users in real time, leave comments and communicate via the built-in chat.
DocumentsTab5Label: View the version history of a document.
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Designed for seamless integration with Alfresco
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Get the ONLYOFFICE app for Alfresco now in the official Alfresco Add-ons directory.
FeaturesFormats: Support for more than <0>50 file formats</0>, fully compatible with MS Office formats: DOCX, XLSX, PPTX.
FeaturesCoEditing: Real-time and paragraph-locking <0>co-editing</0>, review, version history, document comparison, comments & chat. Audio and video calls.
FeaturesFree: Free Community and Scalable Enterprise versions. <0>Free 30-day trial.</0> Self-hosted solution for total control over your data.
FeaturesSecurity: <0>Enhanced security.</0> Flexible access rights and JWT. Encryption at rest and in transit. Watermarking and password protection. Open source code.
FeaturesConfiguration: <0>Easy configuration.</0> Seamless integration with the ready-to-use connector in the Alfresco admin console and automated testing.
FeaturesAIHelper: A robust set of editing, formatting, and styling tools. Integrated <0>AI helper</0>.
HowToStartStep1: Deploy <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> on your own server or sign up for <1>ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud</1>.
HowToStartStep2: Get the integration app from the <0>AlfrescoAdd-ons directory</0>
HowToStartStep3: Configure the integration app in the  Alfresco Administration Console.
HowToConnect: How to integrate ONLYOFFICE with Alfresco Share
LearnMoreHeading: Learn more about ONLYOFFICE Alfresco integration
UsefulGuides: Useful guides on ONLYOFFICE Alfresco Share integration.
AtolCDReinforcesOnlineCollaboration: Atol CD reinforces online collaboration in Alfresco Digital Workspace by integrating ONLYOFFICE Docs.
NeedAnAppToConnect: Need an app to connect ONLYOFFICE Docs to your favorite web service? Or have you developed one?
